amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill for enforcement of the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to enforce subchapter IV of Chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Davis-Bacon Act).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 275 (Roll no. 561).
